Description: This JSON file provides a data dictionary for the code SWT data contained in the corresponding TSV file.

swt_situations.Description: in certain situations I switch languages a lot: 0 never 4 always

swt_subj.Description: on certain topics I switch languages a lot: 0 never 4 always

swt_convo.Description: during a conversation I switch languages a lot: 0 never 4 always

swt_vol.Description: I voluntarily switch my languages: 0 never 4 always

swt_invol.Description: it is hard for me to control switching: 0 not at all 4 a lot (reverse)

swt_unconsc.Description: I don't realise when I switch: 0 never 4 always
